q1: Do you think in the 10 years France could win the World Cup after their past performances?
q2: They already won it so thats the proof
a2: Yup, they won the World Cup in 2018.
q3: But I don't think they will be able to win in 2022
a3: That is too far away to predict. Many things could change between now and then.
q4: I think it's too far to predict, but they have a great chance because of their great team and offensive talent
a4: If I think I win more world
q5: What do you think it will take for France to win the 2022 World Cup?
a5: by the hand of mbappe and paul pogba
